string-array.item: "CREATE TABLE settings (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, parameter TEXT, value TEXT );"

"CREATE TABLE messages (_id INTEGER, content TEXT, background TEXT, date_post INTEGER, like INTEGER, likes INTEGER, comments INTEGER, tags TEXT, link_comment TEXT, link_like TEXT, date_receive INTEGER);"
"CREATE TABLE comments (_id INTEGER, content TEXT, date_post INTEGER, user_id INTEGER, user_name TEXT, user_avatar TEXT, date_receive INTEGER, message_id INTEGER);"
